DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine if treatment with entecavir is safe and well tolerated in patients who completed dosing in a previous entecavir study in China, but are requiring further treatment of their chronic hepatitis B virus infection.
DOC.criteria: Subjects who had completed the required dosing period in a previous ETV Phase 2 or 3 study in China (studies AI463012, AI463023, AI463056), and had been assessed by the Investigators as likely to benefit from additional therapy for treatment of their HBV infection ALT â‰¤ 15 x upper limit of normal Compensated liver disease Coinfection with HIV, HCV, or HDV
